name: Platform To Heaven
description:
Story:

Long ago an ancient civilization on a distant planet created the portals. Gates build of pure light. This ancient project was called once "The Platform To Heaven".

They were powered by the lightshards and secured by guardshards and pepole could travel through big distances with them.

You are an archeocholigst sent on a mission to analyze their nature. But don't forget defen yourself when you have to!

Levels:

There are 4 levels currently in the game. The first is to show the lightshards and the (only one) enemy type. The platformer part begins on the second level.

The moving platforms can be used to launch yourself into the air. You should jump multiple times when you're on one of them and move when you reached  greater height.

Goal:

Activate every one of the LightShards in the level then go to the portal.

If you fall off the map, your position get reset, but if your hp is lowered below 0, the whole level reloads.

Controls: KeyCommandWforwardSbackwardAmove leftDmove rightSPACEjumpTtake screenshotleft mouse click
fire the gun once at a time System requirements:

OpenGL ESL 3.3
